statements: SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE id = 1;
SELECT agent_name, start_time, end_time FROM training_schedule WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE end_time > '2023-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, status FROM training_schedule WHERE start_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT id, agent_name, start_time FROM training_schedule WHERE status = 'Cancelled';
SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT agent_name, start_time FROM training_schedule WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM training_schedule WHERE end_time < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT agent_name, status FROM training_schedule WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training_schedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM agent_tasks;
SELECT agent_name, task_status, scheduled_time FROM agent_tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_id, agent_name, task_status FROM agent_tasks ORDER BY scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM agent_tasks GROUP BY agent_name;
SELECT agent_name, MAX(completed_time) FROM agent_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT agent_name, task_status FROM agent_tasks WHERE agent_name='Alice';
SELECT * FROM agent_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM agent_tasks WHERE task_status='Completed';
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM agent_logs GROUP BY agent_name ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT agent_name, task_id, log_message FROM agent_logs INNER JOIN agent_tasks ON agent_logs.task_id = agent_tasks.task_id WHERE agent_logs.log_time < agent_tasks.completed_time;
SELECT * FROM agents;
SELECT agent_name, training_status FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'pending';
SELECT task_name, agent_id FROM tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY agent_id DESC;
SELECT agent_id, COUNT(*) as task_count FROM tasks GROUP BY agent_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC, training_status ASC;
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM agents JOIN tasks ON agents.agent_id = tasks.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name;
SELECT log_id, log_text, log_timestamp FROM logs WHERE agent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status, agent_name FROM tasks JOIN agents ON tasks.agent_id = agents.agent_id WHERE task_status = 'completed';
SELECT agent_name, COUNT(*) AS log_count FROM agents JOIN logs ON agents.agent_id = logs.agent_id GROUP BY agent_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM rl_agents;
SELECT agent_name, status FROM rl_agents WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT agent_name, status FROM rl_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_jobs WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT agent_name, training_accuracy FROM rl_agents INNER JOIN agent_performance ON rl_agents.agent_id = agent_performance.agent_id;
SELECT * FROM rl_agents WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT agent_id, agent_name FROM rl_agents WHERE agent_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM training_jobs WHERE start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND end_time <= '2022-02-28';
SELECT agent_id, MAX(training_accuracy) AS max_accuracy FROM agent_performance GROUP BY agent_id HAVING MAX(training_accuracy) > 0.9;
SELECT job_id, log_time, message FROM job_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM agent_logs;
SELECT agent_name, creation_date FROM agents WHERE training_type = 'Online';
SELECT agent_id, log_text, log_timestamp FROM agent_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT agent_id, AVG(rewards_received) AS avg_rewards FROM agent_performance GROUP BY agent_id;
SELECT agent_name, training_duration FROM agents JOIN agent_performance ON agents.agent_id = agent_performance.agent_id WHERE rewards_received > 1000;
SELECT * FROM training_jobs WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT agent_id, start_time, end_time, status FROM training_jobs ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT agent_name, creation_date, training_type FROM agents WHERE agent_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, log_text, log_timestamp FROM agent_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT agent_id, SUM(rewards_received) AS total_rewards FROM agent_performance GROUP BY agent_id HAVING total_rewards > 1000;
